text: DXBZ (756 AM) Radyo Bagting is a station owned and operated by Baganian Broadcasting Corporation. The station's studio is located at 2/F, BBC Bldg., Bana St., Brgy. Sta. Maria, Pagadian, and its transmitter is located in Brgy. Upper Bayao, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur.Journalists condemn killing of Zamboanga Sur broadcasterLocal broadcast journalist killed in Zamboanga del Sur ambushPagresolba sa mga media killings, bigo pa rin ang PNP, NBICriminal Case No. SB-13-CRM-0707 ==References== Category:Radio stations in Zamboanga del Sur Category:Radio stations established in 2000 Category:2000 establishments in the Philippines
title: DXBZ-AM
